title: UBCO celebrates the class of 2021

summary: Virtual ceremony recognizes more than 1,800 graduating students UBC Okanagan is marking its second virtual convocation next week. More than 1,850 graduates — including 1,600 undergraduates as well as more than 100 masters’ and doctoral students — will tune in to celebrate the success of their educational journey. “This has been a remarkable year for […]

title: UBC invites wine lovers to learn and wine taste virtually

summary: Celebrate National Rosé Day with local wineries at a free wine tasting event What: Rosés of the Okanagan, virtual wine tasting event Who: Winemakers, winery owners, UBC alumni and wine experts When: Saturday, June 12 starting at 4:30 p.m. Where: Zoom webinar UBC’s alumni association is raising a glass to toast the university’s many alumni […]

title: UBCO researchers examine how pandemics impact the homeless
categories: Faculty of Health and Social Development
summary: A team of UBC Okanagan researchers is looking at strategies that could help the homeless during a pandemic.

title: No time to exercise? No problem, says UBCO researcher
categories: Faculty of Health and Social Development
School of Health and Exercise Sciences
summary: As pandemic restrictions continue, many are looking for innovative ways to get regular exercise—especially as Zoom meetings seem to creep more into personal time.

title: Parental consumption shapes how teens think about and use cannabis
categories: Irving K. Barber Faculty of Arts and Social Sciences
summary: Turns out the old adage, “monkey see, monkey do,” does ring true — even when it comes to cannabis use. However, when cannabis use involves youth, it’s see, think, then do, says a team of UBC Okanagan researchers.

title: UBCO student receives gift of a lifetime from younger sibling
categories: Faculty of Health and Social Development
summary: Most gifts from a younger sibling are rarely memorable. But for Christmas 2019, Adrian Van de Mosselaer received a present from his brother that would change his life.

title: UBCO honours four outstanding researchers of the year

summary: Last Thursday at a special virtual ceremony, UBC Okanagan researchers were honoured for their innovative and groundbreaking work.

title: UBCO researcher examines therapeutic use of psychedelic drugs

summary: Michelle St. Pierre has been named UBC Okanagan’s student researcher of the year.

title: UBCO hosts seventh annual Indigenous Art residency
categories: Faculty of Creative and Critical Studies
summary: UBC Okanagan’s Indigenous Art Intensive gathers artists, curators, writers, students and scholars to engage in contemporary ideas and dialogue rooted in Indigenous contemporary art.

title: UBCO cardiovascular researcher urges women to listen to their hearts
categories: Faculty of Health and Social Development
summary: A UBC Okanagan researcher is urging people to learn and then heed the symptoms of atrial fibrillation (AF). Especially women.
